gm-notes.notes:
- The **skull flares** in the **presence of Molan**.
- The **skull glows brighter** as it **approaches Molan.**
- **Thrown at Molan (DC 10 Agility)**, the skull shatters and **erupts in flame** doing **[[/r 1d6+1]] damage** and **half that to adjacent targets failing a (DC 12 Reflex) save**.
